newsitem.title: USA: USDA extends $6 mln in GSM-103 credits to Lebanon.
newsitem.headline: USDA extends $6 mln in GSM-103 credits to Lebanon.

text.p: The U.S. Agriculture Department Friday said it authorized $6 million in credit guarantees for sales of U.S. breeder livestock to Lebanon under the longer-term GSM-103 program for fiscal year 1997.
